resources.string: "Sorry, that can't be done! Check that the top-up mix is correct."
Improves accuracy of blend and topup calculations
When blending, add helium first instead of oxygen

"To get support for real gas (Van der Waals) mixing, you must install the free ScubaTanks application and choose the size of cylinder you will be filling. If you don't want this, you can continue using the app with the less accurate ideal gas laws."
There was an error reading the set topup mix. Check your settings.
